summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to law enforcement technology, equipment, and support; authorizing the execution of an agreement with the U.S. Department of Justice, Bureau of Justice Assistance for financial assistance in the amount of Two Million Dollars ($2,000,000) to purchase equipment, technology, and other support resources; accepting the money when received; increasing the 2000 budgets of various departments by making reimbursable appropriations; and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
